00001 #include <stdio.h>

00005 /*==============================Longest Path Sort====================================*/
00006 /****************************************
00007  *Sorts from the largest to the smallest
00008  ****************************************/
00009 void swap(List<instruction*> *list, int x, int y) {
00010    instruction* tempX = list->Nth(x); 
00011    instruction* tempY = list->Nth(y);
00012 
00013    list->RemoveAt(x);
00014    list->InsertAt(tempY,x);
00015    list->RemoveAt(y);
00016    list->InsertAt(tempX,y);
00017 } 
00018  
00019 void quicksortLongestPath(List<instruction*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle, bool UPLDhoisting)
00020 // Postcondition: list elements between index left and index right have been
00021 // sorted in increasing order
00022 {
00023     if( left < right )
00024     {
00025         int pivotPosition = partitionLongestPath(list, left, right, cycle, UPLDhoisting);
00026         quicksortLongestPath(list, left, pivotPosition - 1, cycle, UPLDhoisting);
00027         quicksortLongestPath(list, pivotPosition + 1, right, cycle, UPLDhoisting);
00028     }
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 int partitionLongestPath(List<instruction*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle, bool UPLDhoisting) {
00033     int pivotValue = list->Nth(left)->getLongestPath(); //list[left];
00034     Assert(pivotValue > -1);
00035     int originalLeft = left;
00036 
00037     do {
00038         do {
00039             left++;
00040         } while (left < right && list->Nth(left)->getLongestPath() > pivotValue);
00041 
00042         while (list->Nth(right)->getLongestPath() < pivotValue)
00043             right--;
00044         if(left < right)
00045             swap(list, left, right);
00046     } while (left < right);
00047 
00048     swap(list, originalLeft, right);
00049 
00050     return right;
00051 }
00052 
00053  
00054 void quicksortLongestPathDyanmic(List<instruction*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle, bool UPLDhoisting)
00055 // Postcondition: list elements between index left and index right have been
00056 // sorted in increasing order
00057 {
00058     if( left < right )
00059     {
00060         int pivotPosition = partitionLongestPathDynamic(list, left, right, cycle, UPLDhoisting);
00061         quicksortLongestPathDyanmic(list, left, pivotPosition - 1, cycle, UPLDhoisting);
00062         quicksortLongestPathDyanmic(list, pivotPosition + 1, right, cycle, UPLDhoisting);
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 int partitionLongestPathDynamic(List<instruction*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle, bool UPLDhoisting) {
00068     int pivotValue = list->Nth(left)->findLongestPathDynamicly(cycle, UPLDhoisting); //list[left];
00069     int originalLeft = left;
00070 
00071     do {
00072         do {
00073             left++;
00074         } while (left < right && list->Nth(left)->findLongestPathDynamicly(cycle, UPLDhoisting) > pivotValue);
00075 
00076         while (list->Nth(right)->findLongestPathDynamicly(cycle, UPLDhoisting) < pivotValue)
00077             right--;
00078         if(left < right)
00079             swap(list, left, right);
00080     } while (left < right);
00081 
00082     swap(list, originalLeft, right);
00083 
00084     return right;
00085 }

00090 /*==============================Ins Lost Sort====================================*/
00091 /****************************************
00092  *Sorts from the smallest to the largest
00093  ****************************************/
00094 
00095 void quicksortInsList(List<instruction*> *list, int left, int right)
00096 // Postcondition: list elements between index left and index right have been
00097 // sorted in increasing order
00098 {
00099     if( left < right )
00100     {
00101         int pivotPosition = partitionInsList(list, left, right);
00102         quicksortInsList(list, left, pivotPosition - 1);
00103         quicksortInsList(list, pivotPosition + 1, right);
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 int partitionInsList(List<instruction*> *list, int left, int right) {
00109     INS_ID pivotValue = list->Nth(left)->getInsID(); //list[left];
00110     int originalLeft = left;
00111 
00112     do {
00113         do {
00114             left++;
00115         } while (left < right && list->Nth(left)->getInsID() < pivotValue);
00116 
00117         while (list->Nth(right)->getInsID() > pivotValue)
00118             right--;
00119         if(left < right)
00120             swap(list, left, right);
00121     } while (left < right);
00122 
00123     swap(list, originalLeft, right);
00124 
00125     return right;
00126 }

00133 /*==============================List Sort====================================*/
00134 /****************************************
00135  *Sorts from the smallest to the largest
00136  ****************************************/
00137 void swap(List<int> *list, int x, int y) {
00138    int tempX = list->Nth(x); 
00139    int tempY = list->Nth(y);
00140 
00141    list->RemoveAt(x);
00142    list->InsertAt(tempY,x);
00143    list->RemoveAt(y);
00144    list->InsertAt(tempX,y);
00145 } 
00146  
00147 void quicksort(List<int> *list, int left, int right, int cycle)
00148 // Postcondition: list elements between index left and index right have been
00149 // sorted in increasing order
00150 {
00151     if( left < right )
00152     {
00153         int pivotPosition = partition(list, left, right, cycle);
00154         quicksort(list, left, pivotPosition - 1, cycle);
00155         quicksort(list, pivotPosition + 1, right, cycle);
00156     }
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 int partition(List<int> *list, int left, int right, int cycle) {
00161     int pivotValue = list->Nth(left); //list[left];
00162     int originalLeft = left;
00163 
00164     do {
00165         do {
00166             left++;
00167         } while (left < right && list->Nth(left) < pivotValue);
00168 
00169         while (list->Nth(right) > pivotValue)
00170             right--;
00171         if(left < right)
00172             swap(list, left, right);
00173     } while (left < right);
00174 
00175     swap(list, originalLeft, right);
00176 
00177     return right;
00178 }

00182 /*==============================Fragment Sort====================================*/
00183 /****************************************
00184  *Sorts from the smallest to the largest fragment number of bits of dependency id list
00185  ****************************************/
00186 void swap(List<fragment*> *list, int x, int y) { 
00187    fragment* tempX = list->Nth(x); 
00188    fragment* tempY = list->Nth(y);
00189 
00190    list->RemoveAt(x);
00191    list->InsertAt(tempY,x);
00192    list->RemoveAt(y);
00193    list->InsertAt(tempX,y);
00194 } 
00195  
00196 void quicksort(List<fragment*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle)
00197 // Postcondition: list elements between index left and index right have been
00198 // sorted in increasing order
00199 {
00200     if( left < right )
00201     {
00202         int pivotPosition = partition(list, left, right, cycle);
00203         quicksort(list, left, pivotPosition - 1, cycle);
00204         quicksort(list, pivotPosition + 1, right, cycle);
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 
00209 int partition(List<fragment*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle) {
00210     int pivotValue = list->Nth(left)->getNumBits(); //list[left];
00211     int originalLeft = left;
00212 
00213     do {
00214         do {
00215             left++;
00216         } while (left < right && list->Nth(left)->getNumBits() < pivotValue);
00217 
00218         while (list->Nth(right)->getNumBits() > pivotValue)
00219             right--;
00220         if(left < right)
00221             swap(list, left, right);
00222     } while (left < right);
00223 
00224     swap(list, originalLeft, right);
00225 
00226     return right;
00227 }

00230 /****************************************
00231  * Sorts fragments based on their score
00232  ****************************************/
00233 void quicksortFragScore(List<fragment*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle)
00234 // Postcondition: list elements between index left and index right have been
00235 // sorted in increasing order
00236 {
00237     if( left < right )
00238     {
00239         int pivotPosition = partitionFragScore(list, left, right, cycle);
00240         quicksortFragScore(list, left, pivotPosition - 1, cycle);
00241         quicksortFragScore(list, pivotPosition + 1, right, cycle);
00242     }
00243 }
00244 
00245 
00246 int partitionFragScore(List<fragment*> *list, int left, int right, int cycle) {
00247     double pivotValue = list->Nth(left)->getFrScore(); //list[left];
00248     int originalLeft = left;
00249 
00250     do {
00251         do {
00252             left++;
00253         } while (left < right && list->Nth(left)->getFrScore() > pivotValue);
00254 
00255         while (list->Nth(right)->getFrScore() < pivotValue)
00256             right--;
00257         if(left < right)
00258             swap(list, left, right);
00259     } while (left < right);
00260 
00261     swap(list, originalLeft, right);
00262 
00263     return right;
00264 }

00270 /*
00271 
00272 
00273 void quicksort(List<instruction*> *list,int left,int right)
00274 { 
00275    int pivot,i,j,k; 
00276    if( left < right) 
00277    {
00278       k = choose_pivot(left,right); 
00279       swap(list,left,k); 
00280       pivot = list->Nth(left)->findLongestPath(list->Nth(left)->getInsID());
00281       i = left+1; 
00282       j = right;
00283       while(i <= j) 
00284       { 
00285          while((i <= right) && (list->Nth(i)->findLongestPath(list->Nth(i)->getInsID()) <= pivot)) 
00286                 i++; 
00287          while((j >= left) && (list->Nth(j)->findLongestPath(list->Nth(j)->getInsID()) > pivot))
00288                 j--; 
00289          if( i < j) 
00290                 swap(list,i,j); 
00291       }
00292       // swap two elements 
00293       swap(list,left,j); 
00294       // recursively sort the lesser list 
00295       quicksort(list,left,j-1);
00296       quicksort(list,j+1,right); 
00297    }
00298 }
00299 */
